amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 119-399 to require investment advisers and hedge funds to perform know-your-customer verification and implement anti-money laundering procedures for foreign clients.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to require investment advisers and hedge funds to perform know-your-customer verification and implement anti-money laundering procedures for foreign clients.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 211 - 219 (Roll no. 326).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 211 - 219 (Roll no. 326).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
